direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods query records related to BLVT operations (subscription and redemption) with similar parameter handling and request patterns.
Both methods involve BLVT redemption operations with similar control flows and parameter checks.
Both methods access BLVT-related information but for different purposes (info vs. record retrieval).
Both methods handle user-related queries and may encounter similar exceptions related to user limits or permissions.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a properly initialized RequestHandler for API requests.
Redemption operations must be performed before querying redemption records.
Both methods involve verifying API responses and handling potential errors.
